price: 129. Et c’est ainsi que Nous attribuons à quelques-uns parmi les injustes l’autorité sur d’autres, (coupables qu’ils sont) de ce qu’ils ont commis.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
